title: Urn
description: off-white stoneware body with decoration on exterior of horizontal rows of black smoky drip-like spots, creating a coil-like effect; tall form with flat base, flaring outward to slightly wider shoulder, and in to wide mouth; slightly irregular circumference
creditline: Gift of funds from Sheila Morgan, Gayle Fuguitt, Elizabeth Abrohams, Terry Butler, Jeanette Klauder, and Tamara and Michael Root
